filmography.title: The Story of G.I. Joe
filmography.role_description: A weary, dedicated infantry officer leading his men through the Italian campaign of World War II.
filmography.plot: War correspondent Ernie Pyle joins Company C, 18th Infantry as they fight their way across North Africa and Italy during World War II.

filmography.title: Crossfire
filmography.role_description: A cynical army sergeant who assists the police in investigating a murder committed by one of his soldiers, motivated by anti-Semitism.
filmography.plot: A man is murdered, apparently by one of a group of soldiers just out of the army. But which one?

filmography.title: Out of the Past
filmography.role_description: A former private investigator trying to escape his past who is dragged back into a web of betrayal by a dangerous gangster and a femme fatale.
filmography.plot: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him.

filmography.title: Pursued
filmography.role_description: An orphan raised by a neighboring family who is haunted by repressed childhood trauma and a long-standing family feud.
filmography.plot: A man tries to find the origins of his family feud while plagued by flashbacks of his childhood trauma.

filmography.title: Blood on the Moon
filmography.role_description: A drifter hired by an old friend to help in a cattle war, who switches sides when he realizes his friend's corrupt intentions.
filmography.plot: A drifter gets caught up in a conflict between cattlemen and homesteaders, and realizes he may be on the wrong side.

filmography.title: The Big Steal
filmography.role_description: An Army lieutenant falsely accused of robbery who chases the real thief across Mexico.
filmography.plot: An Army officer chases a payroll thief across Mexico to clear his name, accompanied by a woman seeking the same man.

filmography.title: Holiday Affair
filmography.role_description: A free-spirited seasonal clerk who falls for a war widow during Christmas, challenging her desire for stability.
filmography.plot: A young widow is torn between a boring businessman and a romantic ne'er-do-well during the Christmas season.

filmography.title: His Kind of Woman
filmography.role_description: A down-on-his-luck gambler who accepts a mysterious job in a Mexican resort, only to become the pawn of a deported mobster.
filmography.plot: A deported gangster plans to re-enter the USA by assuming the identity of a gambler.

filmography.title: The Lusty Men
filmography.role_description: A washed-up, injured rodeo champion who returns home and mentors a young, ambitious cowhand.
filmography.plot: A retired rodeo star mentors a young man in the sport, but the young man's wife opposes the dangerous lifestyle.

filmography.title: Macao
filmography.role_description: An American drifter in Macao who gets mistaken for an undercover cop by a local crime boss.
filmography.plot: Three strangers arrive in the port of Macao, including a singer, a drifter, and a detective, all with secrets.

filmography.title: Angel Face
filmography.role_description: An ambulance driver who becomes entangled with a wealthy, mentally unstable heiress with murderous intentions.
filmography.plot: A beautiful but dangerous heiress manipulates her chauffeur into a plot to murder her stepmother.

filmography.title: River of No Return
filmography.role_description: A widower and former prisoner who rescues a saloon singer and her gambler boyfriend from a raft, leading to a perilous journey.
filmography.plot: A farmer and his son rescue a saloon singer and a gambler from a river raft, but the gambler steals their horse and gun, leaving them defenseless.

filmography.title: Track of the Cat
filmography.role_description: A domineering brother in a dysfunctional ranch family who hunts a black panther during a blizzard.
filmography.plot: A family in Northern California is snowed in during a winter storm and threatened by a panther.

filmography.title: The Night of the Hunter
filmography.role_description: A misogynistic, serial-killing preacher with 'L-O-V-E' and 'H-A-T-E' tattooed on his knuckles who hunts two children for stolen money.
filmography.plot: A religious fanatic marries a gullible widow whose young children are reluctant to tell him where their real daddy hid the $10,000 he'd stolen.

filmography.title: Not as a Stranger
filmography.role_description: An ambitious but poor medical student who marries a nurse for her money to pay his tuition.
filmography.plot: A medical student marries an older woman to pay his tuition, but his arrogance alienates those around him.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Top Ten Films

filmography.title: Heaven Knows, Mr. Allison
filmography.role_description: A tough Marine stranded on a Pacific island during WWII who forms a unique bond with a nun.
filmography.plot: A Marine and a nun form an unlikely friendship when they are stranded on an island in the Pacific during World War II.

filmography.title: The Enemy Below
filmography.role_description: The captain of an American destroyer who engages in a battle of wits with a German U-boat commander.
filmography.plot: During World War II, an American destroyer discovers a German U-boat, and a deadly game of cat-and-mouse ensues.

filmography.title: Thunder Road
filmography.role_description: A Korean War veteran who returns home to run moonshine in the Tennessee mountains, battling both the law and the mob.
filmography.plot: A veteran comes home from the Korean War to the mountains of Tennessee and takes over the family moonshining business.

filmography.title: Home from the Hill
filmography.role_description: A powerful and philandering Texas landowner whose complicated family life leads to tragedy.
filmography.plot: The story of a wealthy Texan's complicated relationships with his wife, his son, and his illegitimate son.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Sundowners
filmography.role_description: An Australian sheep drover who loves his nomadic life, clashing with his wife's desire for a settled home.
filmography.plot: In 1920s Australia, a family of sheepherders drive a herd across the country, while the wife and son yearn for a permanent home.
filmography.awards: National Board of Review: Win – Best Actor

filmography.title: The Grass Is Greener
filmography.role_description: An American oil tycoon who visits a British stately home and falls for the lady of the house.
filmography.plot: A British Earl fights to save his marriage after an American millionaire falls for his wife.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Motion Picture (Comedy)

filmography.title: Cape Fear
filmography.role_description: A sadistic ex-convict who stalks and terrorizes the family of the lawyer he blames for his imprisonment.
filmography.plot: A lawyer and his family are stalked by a man he helped send to jail.

filmography.title: The Longest Day
filmography.role_description: A determined American general who rallies his troops on Omaha Beach during the D-Day invasion.
filmography.plot: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

filmography.title: El Dorado
filmography.role_description: A drunken, heartbroken sheriff who teams up with his old friend, a gunfighter, to defend a rancher family.
filmography.plot: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara, to help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher.

filmography.title: Ryan's Daughter
filmography.role_description: A mild-mannered village schoolmaster in Ireland who marries a younger woman who eventually cheats on him with a British officer.
filmography.plot: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor (John Mills)

filmography.title: The Friends of Eddie Coyle
filmography.role_description: An aging, small-time gunrunner facing jail time who becomes an informant to protect his family.
filmography.plot: After his last crime, Eddie Coyle looks at a long prison sentence and decides to turn snitch for the Treasury Department.

filmography.title: The Yakuza
filmography.role_description: A retired detective who returns to Japan to rescue a friend's daughter, navigating the complex code of the Yakuza.
filmography.plot: A retired American detective returns to Japan to help an old friend and gets caught up in the violent world of the Yakuza.

filmography.title: Farewell, My Lovely
filmography.role_description: An aging, weary incarnation of the famous private eye investigating a missing persons case that leads to a complex web of murder.
filmography.plot: Los Angeles private eye Philip Marlowe is hired by an ex-con to find his former girlfriend.

filmography.title: Dead Man
filmography.role_description: A hostile metalworks owner who drives the protagonist out of town; one of Mitchum's final film roles.
filmography.plot: On the run after murdering a man, an accountant encounters a strange Native American who prepares him for his journey into the spirit world.
